name: AI Guild
mission: Building the future with artificial intelligence
description: From machine learning models to chatbots, we're pushing the boundaries of what's possible with AI.

name: MUN Guild
mission: Solving global challenges through debate and diplomacy
description: Model United Nations enthusiasts discussing world affairs and honing negotiation skills.

name: No-Code Guild
description: Creating amazing apps and websites using no-code tools like Bubble, Webflow, and Zapier.

name: Design Guild
description: UI/UX designers creating stunning interfaces and user experiences that people love.

name: Content Guild
description: Writers, podcasters, and video creators sharing stories that inspire and educate.

name: Marketing Guild
description: Digital marketers learning growth hacking, social media, and community building.
